spell.name: Scorpio
spell.combatDescription: * Place The Magician on Scorpio * You may choose to discard The Magician from Libra at any time. (It is automatically discarded at end of combat.) * While Scorpio has a card on it, the player generates 1 Magic Damage every time they draw a card.
spell.skillDescription: * Once per Day, summon an disembodied spectral hand, controlled by your mind. * This hand will stick around for about 30 minutes. It moves about as fast as a regular person would. * This hand can lift up to 5lbs.
